Module CAViewer
Package sample.model.rules.ruleloader.ruletable

Class Ruletable

java.lang.Object
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.Directive
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.RuleDirective
sample.model.rules.ruleloader.ruletable.Ruletable
public class Ruletable
extends RuleDirective
Implements Golly ruletables with addition features such as unbounded rules and arbitrary neighbourhoods. See https://github.com/GollyGang/ruletablerepository/wiki. TODO (Nutshell syntax)
